text: Sonny Stitt / Live at Ronnie Scott's is the fifth Dick Morrissey Quartet recording. It comprises a jam session with Sonny Stitt recorded live at Ronnie Scott's Jazz Club, London in 1965. It has also been released on the same label with the title Sonny's Blues. == Track listing == #"Ernest's Blues" #"Home Sweet Home" #"M-O-T-H-E-R" #"My Mother's Eyes" #"Sonny's Theme Song" #"Blues with Dick and Harry" #"It Could Happen to You" (Johnny Burke and Jimmy Van Heusen) #"Oh, Lady Be Good!" (George and Ira Gershwin) #Interview with Sonny Stitt == Personnel == *Ernest Ranglin - Guitar *Sonny Stitt - tenor sax *Dick Morrissey - tenor sax *Harry South - piano *Phil Bates - double bass *Bill Eyden - drums Category:Dick Morrissey albums Category:Sonny Stitt live albums Category:1965 live albums Category:Self-released albums Category:albums recorded at Ronnie Scott's Jazz Club
title: Sonny Stitt / Live at Ronnie Scott's
